name: funsn

stmt.origin: mp2an(wfun(csn(cop(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(Fun({ < c0, c1 > }), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wfun(csn(cop(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wfun(csn(cop(c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfun(csn(cop(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wfun(csn(cop(c0, c1))))

comment: A singleton of an ordered pair is a function. Theorem 10.5 of [Quine] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1994.)
